workflow.name: Generate exam question papers with GPT-4 and email delivery
workflow.description:
## Who Is This For? This workflow is designed for educators, universities, examination departments, and EdTech institutions that need a faster, smarter, and standardized way to prepare exam question papers. ## What Problem Does This Solve? Creating balanced, outcome-based question papers can take hours or even days of manual effort. Faculty often struggle to: - Ensure syllabus coverage across units - Maintain Bloom‚Äôs Taxonomy alignment - Keep a consistent difficulty balance - Format papers in institution-specific templates # **How it works** This workflow automatically generates an exam question paper based on syllabus topics submitted via a form and sends it to the entered email address. Here‚Äôs the flow in simple steps: **Form Submission** ‚Äì A student or faculty fills out a form with subject code, syllabus topics, and their email. **AI Question Generation** ‚Äì The workflow passes the syllabus to AI agents (Part A with 2 Marks, Part B with 13 Marks, and Part C with 14 Marks) to create question sets. The marks and the no. of question generated can be customized according to the convenience. **Merging Questions** ‚Äì All AI-generated questions are combined into a single structured document. **Format into HTML** ‚Äì The questions are formatted into a clean HTML exam paper (can also be extended to PDF). **Send by Email**‚Äì The formatted exam paper is sent to the user‚Äôs email (with option to CC/BCC). # Set up steps **Connect Accounts** - Connect your OpenAI (or LLM) credentials for AI-powered question generation. - Connect your Gmail (or preferred email service) to send emails. **Prepare Form** - Create an n8n form trigger with required fields: - Subject with Code - Syllabus for Unit 1, 2, 3‚Ä¶ - Email to receive the paper **Customize Question Generation** - Modify the AI prompts for Parts A, B, and C to fit your syllabus style (e.g., 2-mark, 13-mark, 14-mark). **Format the Exam Paper** - Adjust the HTML template to match your institution‚Äôs exam paper layout. **Test & Deploy** - Submit a test form entry. - Check the received email to ensure formatting looks good. - Deploy the workflow to production for real usage. ## Need help customizing?

‚úâÔ∏è Contact Me üíº LinkedIn

workflow.name: Generate Exam Question Papers with GPT-4 and Email Delivery

values.fieldLabel: Name of the subject with code
Enter your email to send the Exam Question Paper.
values.placeholder: You will receive the question paper link in the email.

parameters.text:
=You are a professor in a college assigned to create a question paper for the syllabus.

Task

Create 2 questions, each worth 14 marks, from the following syllabus: {{ $json['syllabus for unit 1'] }}.

Generate questions that align with Bloom‚Äôs Taxonomy levels ‚Äî Analyze and Evaluate.

Output Format

Display each question separately on a new line, one after another.

Output exactly 2 questions in total.

Do not include question numbers in the output.

Return the output in valid JSON format as shown below:

{
  "QuestionsC": [
    "string (question from Unit 1 - 1)",
    "string (question from Unit 1 - 2)"
  ]
}

parameters.sendTo: ={{ $node["On form submission"].json["Enter your email to send the Exam Question Paper."] }}
parameters.message:
=Thank you for your interest. We have 

{{ $json.html }}
parameters.subject: ={{ $node["On form submission"].json["Name of the subject with code"] }} Question Paper

parameters.content: In the HTML section enter the html code of the question paper template and call the generated question from AI Agents
You will receive the generated question paper in the email.
In the form, input the subject code/name, syllabus, and email to send the question paper

parameters.html:
AI-AGENT LEARNING AND TRAINING COLLEGE

Autonomous | Approved by AIXYZ | Affiliated to XYZ University

College Code: XYZ123

Assessment QP ‚Äì Month ‚Äì Year (for III, V and VII Sem)

Sub. Code/Name: 24YSN2025 - {{ $node['On form submission'].json['Name of the subject with code'] }}

Slot/Strength: 25FLrn / NN Students

PART ‚Äì A (4 x 2 = 08 Marks)

1. {{ $json.QuestionsA[0] }}

2. {{ $json.QuestionsA[1] }}

3. {{ $json.QuestionsA[2] }}

4. {{ $json.QuestionsA[3] }}

PART ‚Äì B (2 x 13 = 26 Marks)

3a. {{ $json.QuestionsB[0] }}

or

3b. {{ $json.QuestionsB[1] }}

4a. {{ $json.QuestionsB[2] }}

or

4b. {{ $json.QuestionsB[3] }}

PART ‚Äì C (Case Study / Applications) (1 x 14 = 14 Marks)

5a. {{ $json.QuestionsC[0] }}

or

5b. {{ $json.QuestionsC[1] }}

Generated on: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString("en-GB") }} template by Gracewell89 via N8N

parameters.content: This AI Agent will generate four 2 mark questions
This AI Agent will generate four 13 mark questions with each question having 2 choices
This AI Agent will generate two 14 mark questions with each question having 2 choices
